bills_date_logic_check.name: bills_date_logic_check
bills_date_logic_check.value:
"bills"."last_action_date" IS NULL OR "bills"."introduced_date" IS NULL OR 
        "bills"."last_action_date" >= "bills"."introduced_date"

committees_leadership_check.name: committees_leadership_check
committees_leadership_check.value: "committees"."chair_id" IS NULL OR "committees"."vice_chair_id" IS NULL OR "committees"."chair_id" != "committees"."vice_chair_id"

sponsors_term_date_check.name: sponsors_term_date_check
sponsors_term_date_check.value: "sponsors"."term_end" IS NULL OR "sponsors"."term_start" IS NULL OR "sponsors"."term_end" >= "sponsors"."term_start"

campaigns_date_range_check.name: campaigns_date_range_check
campaigns_date_range_check.value: "campaigns"."target_end_date" IS NULL OR "campaigns"."launch_date" IS NULL OR "campaigns"."target_end_date" >= "campaigns"."launch_date"

ambassadors_contact_method_check.name: ambassadors_contact_method_check
ambassadors_contact_method_check.value: "ambassadors"."contact_phone" IS NOT NULL OR "ambassadors"."contact_email" IS NOT NULL

idx_participation_cohorts_age_gender.name: idx_participation_cohorts_age_gender
idx_participation_cohorts_age_gender.where: "participation_cohorts"."age_range" IS NOT NULL AND "participation_cohorts"."gender" IS NOT NULL

idx_moderation_queue_qa_required.name: idx_moderation_queue_qa_required
idx_moderation_queue_qa_required.where: qa_review_required = true AND qa_reviewed_by IS NULL

idx_user_verification_expiry.name: idx_user_verification_expiry
idx_user_verification_expiry.where: expires_at IS NOT NULL AND verification_status = 'verified'
